com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.transcode

Class BitmapDrawableTranscoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.transcode.BitmapDrawableTranscoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceTranscoder<Bitmap,BitmapDrawable>

    public class BitmapDrawableTranscoder
extends Object
implements ResourceTranscoder<Bitmap,BitmapDrawable>
    An ResourceTranscoder that converts Bitmaps into BitmapDrawables.
